record.challenge: Join an online social group/club
Research something that you have a fear of (bees/spiders/snakes are very popular)
Write down 3 things you want to do before you die, but haven’t done yet
Make eye contact with 3 strangers today
Meditate in silence for 5 minutes
Tell someone “no” when it seems difficult
Smile at 10 people today
Ask a stranger for directions
Tell your boss about a problem you have at work
Take a really long time to decide what you want at a store when someone tries to help you
Go through an in person checkout instead of a self checkout
Join an in person social group/club
Send a text to the person at the bottom of your message feed
Ask a random stranger where their favorite restaurant/shop/bar is
Call in your order instead of ordering online
Attempt to start a conversation with the next person you see
Ask a stranger if you can buy them a cup of coffee
Ask a customer service employee for a recommendation, and try whatever they say
Walk backwards on a public sidewalk for 2 minutes
Ask a stranger to borrow $1
Ask a stranger for their number
Try a physical activity that you have no experience in
Ask for directions to a place you are standing right in front of
Go to a sit down bar/restaurant alone
Take the coldest shower possible for 30 seconds
Get 3 high fives from stranger
Lay down silently on a crowded sidewalk for 2 minutes
Walk up to a group of people playing a game/sport and ask if you can join
Ask a customer service employee to “surprise you” (this works great at bars)
Post a clip of you singing on your main social media account
Post a clip of you dancing on your main social media account
Get 3 phone numbers from attractive strangers
Tell a stranger your biggest insecurity, then ask for theirs
Tell a stranger your biggest fear, then ask for theirs
Dial a random phone number until you have a 5 minute+ phone call
Get a stranger to sing along with you in public
Get a stranger to dance with you in public
Sing at a karaoke event
Sing a song out loud amongst people on a sidewalk
Invite 10 people who don’t know each other to all hangout
Ask 5 attractive strangers for their phone numbers
Go to a music store and play an instrument that you’ve never tried before loud enough for everyone to hear
Dance in public with no music playing (no headphones allowed)
Take an ice bath for 2 minutes
Delete your most used social media app for 7 days
Go to a dance club and stand perfectly still for one full song
Paint something and try to sell it for a profit
Write and read a poem at an open mic night
Go skydiving
Buy a ticket for the next flight out from your local airport
Coordinate a group gathering of 5+ people
Buy and wear an outfit that you like in public
Tell a stranger your deepest secret
Ask out your crush
Start and maintain an interaction without talking (facial expressions, common hand gestures, etc.)
Perform a stand-up routine at an open mic night
Make nonstop eye contact with a stranger until they look away first
